thread.title: Mets gear up to face 'those 2 animals' at Dodger Stadium
thread.title_full: Mets gear up to face 'those 2 animals' at Dodger Stadium

title: Mets gear up to face 'those 2 animals' at Dodger Stadium
text:
> Top News Mets gear up to face 'those 2 animals' at Dodger Stadium Los Angeles Dodgers starting pitcher Brett Anderson, left, starting pitcher Clayton Kershaw, center, and starting pitcher Zack Greinke sit together during workouts in preparation for the National League Division Series against the New York Mets that is set to begin on Friday, Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015, in Los Angeles. (AP Photo/Mark J. Terrill) Search Help
